bio:
Millius is a named skeleton found on Solstheim.
Millius was the assistant of Gratian Caerellius, and ventured to Raven Rock Mine to have a look at what the miners found.
The remains of Millius can be found inside Raven Rock Mine, in front of the stairs leading to Gratian Caerellius' corpse. Next to his corpse lies a pickaxe.
name: Millius
